template.name: Trello Odoo Connector - Enhance Project Management & ERP Integration

div.p: Trello consolidates your tasks, team members, and tools into one centralized platform for streamlined project management.

img.title: Trello Odoo Connector - Enhance Project Management & ERP Integration
Trello Odoo Connector - Enhance Project Management & ERP Integration

div.p: Trello serves as an efficient project management and team collaboration tool. With a board-like appearance that resembles sticky notes, it enables users to categorize and rearrange projects and tasks across columns, thereby reflecting the workflow, project ownership, and status. Our system further facilitates the seamless import and export of your Trello project and task data.

div.h2: Looking to seamlessly synchronize tasks and projects between Trello and Odoo? Explore our comprehensive workflow solutions for efficient collaboration

header.h6: Our suite of adaptable features is designed to facilitate and empower your growth.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Easy to sync task and project with Trello to Odoo

div.p: Easy to sync tasks and projects with Trello to Odoo and Odoo to Trello.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Easy to sync task with attachment and messages

div.p: Easy to sync tasks with attachments and messages.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Here it will create stages automatically

div.p: Here it will create stages automatically while importing tasks from Trello.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Easy to define project which you want

div.p: Easy to define the project which you want to export on Trello.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Here you have option for create a cron

div.p: Here you have the option of creating a cron for auto import and export.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Easy to trace import export activity with logs

div.p: Easy to trace import-export activity with logs.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

svg.title: Easy to sync your project's task with single 'Refresh' button

div.p: Easy to sync your project's task with a single 'Refresh' button.

div.class: col-xxl-3 col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: No more configuration is required, just install it, and cheers!
